name: Force Upgrade
description:
[version_rules](https://gist.github.com/seancain/ddc95dd1c361ec9c604a9813061acb79#file-version_rules-js)

Cases intentionally ONLY validate Force Upgrade functionality.

Suggested Upgrade functionality is no longer needed to message user, since we have integrated One Signal in-app messaging.

NOTE: with iOS 11.0 Release, Logged Out User no longer witnesses the Force Upgrade message until after logging in. iOS has shifted to use OneSignal In-App Upgrade message which will prompt user whenever app is opened (regardless of state)

NOTE: with Android 11.3 Release, Firebase Remote Config - Force Upgrade cases no longer showing the Force Upgrade prompt for neither a logged in user NOR a logged out user[BPA-6479](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6479)
